actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a survey and investigation of the site containing the graves of American Revolutionary War soldiers and sailors, located on a section of the Brooklyn Navy Yard in the city of New York.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to survey and investigate the site containing the graves of American Revolutionary War soldiers and sailors located in the Brooklyn Navy Yard in New York City in order to avoid damage to a potential national historic treasure.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a survey and investigation of the site containing the graves of American Revolutionary War soldiers and sailors, located on a section of the Brooklyn Navy Yard in the city of New York.
